goals.active: The Seraph archer can point me to the bandit hideout.
goals.complete: The Seraph archer told about a bandit cave down by the lake.

goals.active: Infiltrate the bandit hideout to keep Quinn out of jail.
goals.complete: The gang didn't recognize the disguised me, which made it easy to infiltrate them. Eventually, I found out they plan to poison the city's water supply. I need to tell Captain Thackeray about this.

goals.active: Speak to Captain Thackeray in Divinity's Reach.
goals.complete: I told Thackeray that the bandits were planning to poison the water supply. I had to choose: go with him to stop the poisoners, or go to save Quinn. It wasn't an easy decision.
